DOC.brief_summary: This control study test effectiveness stepped-care approach standard behavioral weight loss treatment obese patient Binge Eating Disorder ( BED ) . The major question whether stepped-care approach , begin behavioral weight loss follow decision tree additional intervention base early treatment response superior standard behavioral treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Obesity Binge Eating : Behavioral Weight Loss Versus Stepped Care
DOC.detailed_description: The stepped-care arm study include obesity medication intervention . At start study , active medication sibutramine compare placebo control . On 10/8/2010 , Abbott Laboratories withdraw obesity drug sibutramine ( Meridia ) market light clinical trial data point increase risk stroke myocardial infarction . In response event , investigator submit IRB amendment change active obesity medication sibutramine Orlistat . The IRB amendment approve 11/4/2010 . The PI receive approval NIH/NIDDK Program Officer Robert Kuczmarski enact change .
